about.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you agree
to cease control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black gives
you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting. You will save time and mental energy for more important matters.

name: black
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "black" %}
{% set version = "19.10b0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c2edb73a08e9e0e6f65a0e6af18b059b8b1cdd5bef997d7a0b181df93dc81539

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  skip: True  # [py<36]
  entry_points:
    - black = black:patched_main

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools_scm
  run:
    - python
    - click >=6.5
    - attrs >=18.1.0
    - appdirs
    - toml >=0.9.4
    - typed-ast >=1.4.0
    - regex
    - pathspec >=0.6,<1
    - dataclasses >=0.6  # [py<37]
    - typing_extensions >=3.7.4
    - mypy_extensions >=0.4.3

test:
  commands:
    - black --help

about:
  home: https://github.com/python/black
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'The Uncompromising Code Formatter'

  description: |
    Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you agree
    to cease control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black gives
    you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
    formatting. You will save time and mental energy for more important matters.
  doc_url: https://github.com/python/black
  dev_url: https://github.com/python/black

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - carlodri
    - ambv
    - mariusvniekerk
    - xhochy
